get.description: Returns a list of companies in the network.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number of the page to retrieve

parameters.name: per
parameters.description: Count of items in each page. Should be between 1 and 100 (inclusive)

parameters.name: f.ref
parameters.description: The ref for the company.

parameters.name: f.metadata.YOUR_METADATA_KEY
parameters.description: Only return companies that have a specific metadata key-value pair. Multiple metadata filters can be added to a single query. If there are multiple metadata filters each with the same metadata key, then the filter will return companies matching any of the specified metadata values for that metadata key.

get.description: Retrieves the details of a single company.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique id for the requested company

get.description: Retrieves the details of your own organization.
Returns a list of contacts in the network.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number of the page to retrieve

parameters.name: per
parameters.description: Count of items in each page. Should be between 1 and 100 (inclusive)

parameters.name: f.company_ref
parameters.description: The ref for the company.

parameters.name: f.company.id
parameters.description: The id for the company.

parameters.name: f.location.id
parameters.description: Filters out all contacts not related to this location.

name.description: Always required. Name of the new contact.

email.description: Always required. Email address of the new contact.

phone_number.description: Always required. Phone number of the new contact.

company_id.description: ID of the new contact's company. If not specified, the contact will be created for your company.

get.description: Retrieves the details of a single contact.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique id for the requested contact

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique id for the requested contact

email.description: Updated email address of the contact

phone_number.description: Updated phone number of the contact

get.description: Returns a list of the company entity objects in the network.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number of the page to retrieve

parameters.name: per
parameters.description: Count of items in each page. Should be between 1 and 100 (inclusive)

parameters.name: f.ref
parameters.description: The ref for the company entity

parameters.name: f.company_id
parameters.description: The id for the company entity's parent company

parameters.name: f.company_ref
parameters.description: The ref for the company entity's parent company

post.summary: Create and return a new company entity

name.description: Always required. Legal name of the new company entity

company_id.description: The id of the new company entity's parent company. Either company_id or company_ref is required

company_ref.description: The ref of the new company entity's parent company. Either company_id or company_ref is required

ref.description: Not required. The ref that will be created for the new company entity

number.description: Full VAT number, including the country code

vat_numbers.description: Not required. An array of VAT Numbers for the new company entity.

get.description: Retrieves the details of a single company entity

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique id for the requested company entity

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique id for the requested company entity

name.description: New legal name of the company entity

ref.description: New ref for the company entity

number.description: Full VAT number, including the country code

vat_numbers.description: If a value for vat_numbers is specified, the array specified will replace all the existing VAT numbers of the company entity

get.description: Returns a list of location objects in the network.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number of the page to retrieve

parameters.name: per
parameters.description: Count of items in each page. Should be between 1 and 100 (inclusive)

parameters.name: f.ref
parameters.description: The ref for the location.

parameters.name: f.company_ref
parameters.description: The ref for a company.

parameters.name: f.company.id
parameters.description: The id for a company.

parameters.name: f.contact.id
parameters.description: The id for a contact at this location.

parameters.name: f.metadata.YOUR_METADATA_KEY
parameters.description: Only return locations that have a specific metadata key-value pair. Multiple metadata filters can be added to a single query. If there are multiple metadata filters each with the same metadata key, then the filter will return locations matching any of the specified metadata values for that metadata key.

post.summary: Create and return a new location

company_id.description: The id of the company entity to create this location for

contact_ids.description: Array of contact id's to assign to this location

ref.description: Not required. The ref that will be created for the new company entity

get.description: Retrieves the details of a single location

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique id for the requested location

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique id for the requested location

contact_ids.description: If a value for contact_ids is specified, the array specified will replace all the existing contacts at the location

Metadata.description: Set of custom key-values specific to the object. The keys are strings and values are arrays of strings.

_object.description: Type of the object. Always /network/company for this object.
Type of the object. Always /network/location for this object.
Type of the object. Always /network/contact for this object.
Type of the object. Always /company_entity for this object.

id.description: Unique identifier for the company entity

_object.description: Type of the object. Always /company_entity/vat_number for this object.

number.description: Full VAT number, including the country code
